014package org.jdbi.v3.core.statement;
015
016import com.github.benmanes.caffeine.cache.Caffeine;
017import org.antlr.v4.runtime.CharStreams;
018import org.antlr.v4.runtime.Token;
019import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.lexer.HashStatementLexer;
020import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.internal.ErrorListener;
021import org.jdbi.v3.meta.Beta;
022
023import static org.antlr.v4.runtime.Recognizer.EOF;
024import static org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.lexer.HashStatementLexer.COMMENT;
025import static org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.lexer.HashStatementLexer.DOUBLE_QUOTED_TEXT;
026import static org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.lexer.HashStatementLexer.ESCAPED_TEXT;
027import static org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.lexer.HashStatementLexer.LITERAL;
028import static org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.lexer.HashStatementLexer.NAMED_PARAM;
029import static org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.lexer.HashStatementLexer.POSITIONAL_PARAM;
030import static org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.lexer.HashStatementLexer.QUOTED_TEXT;
031
032/**
033 * SQL parser which recognizes named parameter tokens of the form
034 * <code>#tokenName</code>.
035 */
036public class HashPrefixSqlParser extends CachingSqlParser {
037
038    public HashPrefixSqlParser() {}
039
040    @Beta
041    public HashPrefixSqlParser(final Caffeine<Object, Object> cache) {
042        super(cache);
043    }
044
045    @Override
046    public String nameParameter(String rawName, StatementContext ctx) {
047        return "#" + rawName;
048    }
049
050    @Override
051    ParsedSql internalParse(String sql) {
052        ParsedSql.Builder parsedSql = ParsedSql.builder();
053        HashStatementLexer lexer = new HashStatementLexer(CharStreams.fromString(sql));
054        lexer.addErrorListener(new ErrorListener());
055        Token t = lexer.nextToken();
056        while (t.getType() != EOF) {
057            switch (t.getType()) {
058                case COMMENT:
059                case LITERAL:
060                case QUOTED_TEXT:
061                case DOUBLE_QUOTED_TEXT:
062                    parsedSql.append(t.getText());
063                    break;
064                case NAMED_PARAM:
065                    parsedSql.appendNamedParameter(t.getText().substring(1));
066                    break;
067                case POSITIONAL_PARAM:
068                    parsedSql.appendPositionalParameter();
069                    break;
070                case ESCAPED_TEXT:
071                    parsedSql.append(t.getText().substring(1));
072                    break;
073                default:
074                    break;
075            }
076            t = lexer.nextToken();
077        }
078        return parsedSql.build();
079    }
080}
